thread.title: Our pleasant stay together with my brother and sister in law from Canada
thread.title_full: Our pleasant stay together with my brother and sister in law from Canada - Review of Hotel Madrid, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Ueli B
title: Our pleasant stay together with my brother and sister in law from Canada
text:
Actually, I have nothing to add or deduct from my review of 23rd September 2015!
Again, my wife and I, as well as this time my brother and my sister in law from Canada, had a great stay in Rome at the Hotel Madrid. This hotel - besides several other advantages such as location etc - is unique mainly because of the kindness of its staff, many of them working there since years. They go out of their way any time to comply with the wishes of their guests, doing so with genuine friendliness. Again: thumps up!
Room Tip: do not know - suggest to ask at the riception See more room tips
